title: Feature Support bottom-layer silkscreen Pin labels
description: Adds support for placing silkscreen reference text on the bottom layer of the PCB.

title: Fixed bug where top and bottom schPinArrangment don't work without left or right
description: Fixes bug where top and bottom schPinArrangement dont function correctly when left or right arrangements are not defined.

title: update dep
description: Updates the version of the tscircuitfootprinter dependency from 0.0.203 to 0.0.204 in package.json.

title: Added repro for externally connected pins bug
description: Adds a test case that reproduces the bug related to externally connected pins in the circuit rendering.

title: Fix Pin Aliases and Use Standard Transistor Pin Labels in Connections (collector, emitter, base)
description: Fixes pin aliases for transistors to use standard labels (collector, emitter, base) in connections, ensuring correct schematic representation.
body: Now we are following this clockwise direction.

title: Update the footprinter dep to support `_textbottom` flag for 0603 etc
description: Updates the footprinter dependency to version 0.0.203 to support the _textbottom flag for 0603 components.

title: parse CODEOWNERS file that's in root
description: Adds functionality to fetch and parse the CODEOWNERS file from the root or .github directory, improving code ownership management.

title: Fixing Inconsistent Stroke Width on Resizable SVG Schematic Boxes
description: Fixes inconsistent stroke width rendering for resizable SVG schematic boxes based on zoom level.

title: Add polygon pad rendering
description: Adds support for rendering polygon SMT pads in SVG, including bounds calculation and testing.
body:
## Summary
- support polygon SMT pads in bounds calculation
- fix polygon pad SVG generation
- showcase polygon SMT pad in a new story
- test polygon SMT pad rendering

## Testing
- `npm run format`
- `bun test`

title: ui patches to fix annoying stuff
description: Fixes layout issues and styling inconsistencies across multiple pages in the application.

title: feat(download): Add SPICE netlist download option
description: Adds the capability to download a SPICE netlist for a given circuit using the circuit-json-to-spice package.
body:
This PR introduces the capability to download a SPICE netlist for a given circuit.                                                

It utilizes the circuit-json-to-spice package to convert the circuit's JSON representation into a SPICE-compatible format. A      
"SPICE Netlist" option has been added to the download menu.

title: fix: update file selection logic to handle hidden files in CodeEditorHeader and useFileManagement
description: Fixes file selection logic to correctly handle hidden files in the CodeEditorHeader and useFileManagement hook, ensuring users can select visible files only.

title: Hide file delete option for non-owners
description: Hides the file delete option in the FileSidebar component for users who do not own the package, ensuring that only the owner can delete files.
body:
## Summary
- show delete option only if current user owns the package
- remove `canDeleteFiles` prop and check ownership inside `FileSidebar`
- propagate `pkg` to `CodeEditor` so sidebar can access ownership info

## Testing
- `npm run format`
- `bun x playwright test` *(fails: browserType.launch executable missing)*

- Introduced `mainComponentPath` to the RunFrameWithApi component, allowing for a customizable main component to be rendered.
